name: Bob the Hitman
description:
Description

This game is a fast paced top-down brawler. Take part in a game about an insane man's day with short and intense levels. Fight your way through thugs, cops and aliens in this short but adrenaline pumped mini action-brawler.

Controlls

Movement: W A S D

Pick up weapons: E

Interact: F

A game by Erik Brunnström and Hampus Viklander
